text: George Gilbert "Gil" Ray (September 17, 1956 â€“ January 24, 2017) was an American rock drummer, guitarist, and singer. He is known as a member of the bands Game Theory and The Loud Family with Scott Miller. He was born in Charlotte, North Carolina. He moved to San Francisco, California in 1982. Ray died of cancer on January 24, 2017, at the age of 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American rock drummers Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:Cancer deaths in the United States Category:Entertainers from Charlotte, North Carolina
title: Gil Ray
